addProperty.title: Add Property
addProperty.subtitle: Fill in property information step by step
addProperty.error: Error saving property. Please try again.

step1.title: Transaction Type
step1.subtitle: Select the type of property transaction
step1.bothDescription: Property available for sale and rent

step3.title: Address and Location
step3.subtitle: Specify where the property is located
step3.regionHint: Select the region where the property is located
step3.addressHint: Specify exact address for map display
step3.coordinatesError: Failed to get coordinates. Try manual input.
step3.invalidFormat: Invalid coordinates format. Use: latitude, longitude
step3.manualInputDescription: Open Google Maps link in browser and copy coordinates from URL
step3.dragMarkerHint: You can drag the red marker to refine location

instructions.title: How to Get Google Maps Link
instructions.mobileStep1: Open Google Maps app on your phone
instructions.mobileStep2: Find the property on the map or enter address in search
instructions.mobileStep3: Press and hold your finger on the property point on the map
instructions.mobileStep4: A card with location information will appear at the bottom
instructions.mobileStep6: Select 'Copy link' and paste it in the field above
instructions.desktopStep1: Open Google Maps in browser on computer
instructions.desktopStep2: Find the property on the map or enter address
instructions.desktopStep4: In the menu that appears, click on coordinates (first line)
instructions.desktopStep5: Coordinates will be copied to clipboard
instructions.desktopStep6: Or press 'Share' button and copy short link

step4.title: Property Characteristics
step4.subtitle: Specify basic parameters
step4.bedroomsInfo: Number of bedrooms in the property
step4.outdoorAreaInfo: Area of terraces, balconies and other outdoor zones
step4.floorsInfo: Total number of floors in the building
step4.helpText: Specify exact dimensions for better property presentation to potential buyers or tenants
step4.condoNote: For condominiums specify indoor area and floor number
step4.apartmentNote: For apartments specify indoor area and floor number
step4.villaNote: For villas specify indoor area, plot size and number of floors
step4.houseNote: For houses specify indoor area, plot size and number of floors
step4.penthouseNote: For penthouses specify indoor area, floor number and number of levels in penthouse
step4.landNote: For land plots specify total plot area

step5.title: Additional Information
step5.subtitle: Fill in property details
step5.furnitureInfo: Availability and condition of furniture in property
step5.transferFeeHint: Who bears the costs when transferring ownership

step6.title: Ownership Rights
step6.subtitle: Specify property ownership information
step6.skipMessage: This step is skipped for rental-only properties
step6.rentOnlyDescription: Ownership information is not required for rental-only properties

houseVilla.title: How do you own this house?

info.title: About Ownership Rights
info.description: Select applicable ownership types for your property

step7.title: Property Features
step7.subtitle: Select all available amenities
step7.summaryText: You have selected {{count}} features. This will help attract more clients!
step7.selectFeaturesHint: Select your property features to attract clients

step8.title: Description and Photos
step8.subtitle: Add visual content and description
step8.dropzone: Drag photos here or click to select
step8.descriptionLanguages: Fill in description in available languages
step8.atLeastOneLanguage: Fill in at least one description
step8.propertyNamePlaceholder: For example: Luxury Villa with Sea View
step8.photosHint: Add quality photos of the property
step8.uploadPhotosHint: Drag files here or click to select
step8.multilingualHint: Russian is required. Fill in descriptions in other languages to attract international clients.
step8.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Use JPG, PNG or WebP
step8.fileTooLarge: File size must not exceed 10 MB

step9.title: Pricing and Rates
step9.subtitle: Set prices for property sale and/or rental
step9.basePriceHint: This is the standard price that will apply outside seasonal periods
step9.minimumNightsHint: Minimum number of nights for booking
step9.seasonalPricingHint: Set different prices for different periods of the year
step9.addSeasonHint: Click the button above to add seasonal pricing

step10.title: Availability Calendar
step10.subtitle: Synchronization with booking calendar
step10.icsInfo: Paste your iCal calendar link for automatic booking synchronization
step10.rentalOnlyMessage: Availability calendar is only needed for rental properties
step10.calendarInfo: ICS format calendar allows automatic booking synchronization from various platforms (Airbnb, Booking.com, etc.). Specify your calendar link and the system will automatically mark occupied dates.
step10.syncInfo: Synchronization will occur automatically every 4 hours
step10.icsCalendarUrlHint: Paste your calendar link from Airbnb, Booking.com or Google Calendar
step10.instruction1: Open calendar settings in Airbnb or Booking.com
step10.instruction3: Copy the provided link (it should end with .ics)
step10.instruction4: Paste the link in the field above for automatic synchronization
step10.completionText: After adding the calendar link, click 'Finish' to publish the property
step10.saleOnlyDescription: Availability calendar is only needed for rental properties
step10.icsCalendarHint: Paste ICS calendar link for automatic booking synchronization

icsInstructions.title: ICS Link Instructions
icsInstructions.airbnb1: Log in to your Airbnb account

step10.manualBlockingHint: You can also manually block dates after creating the property
step10.skipStepNote: You can set up calendar later
